title: New: B.O.X.E.R. – Have Mercy With The Naked
body:
Hamburg trio **B.**

**O.X.E.R.** are simultaneously intimidating and sensual on their debut single, _Have Mercy With The Naked_. With production not too dissimilar to the likes of Lorde, or even Purity Ring, it’s the R&B influenced vocals and, atmospheric, dominating synth sections that make this track such an intriguing listen. Check it out below.
